DOC.detailed_description: Neonatal disease respiratory distress transient tachypnea newborn may require high level intensive care . On hand , minor difficulty respiration resolve within hour . Therefore , need biochemical marker addition clinical condition help physician understand clinical progress disease . Serum NT-ProBNP level evaluate transient tachypnea newborn find compatible clinical progress . Urine NT-proBNP recently evaluate patent ductus arterioses find compatible cardiac progress . However , urine Nt-proBNP , need blood sampling collect easily , evaluate respiratory distress newborn . The investigator aim evaluate prognostic value urine NT-proBNP respiratory disease newborns control trial .
